ComicInfo.Summary:
The world has changed for Green Hornet and Kato as they find themselves against foes unlike any they have faced before. With the stakes getting higher with each move they make, will Green Hornet and Kato be able to protect the star child from their newest and deadliest enemy?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Lee Weeks | 1 | B | Cover B | Anthony Marques | 2 | C/RE | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Anthony Marques | 3 | D/RE | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Lee Weeks | 4 | E/LE | Limited Edition "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Lee Weeks | 5 | F/FOC | 1:11 Bonus FOC Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Anthony Marques | 6 | G/LE | Limited Edition Premium "Black & White Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Lee Weeks | 7 |
